column1: English Sent: The Himalayas represent the loftiest and one of the most rugged mountain barriers of the world.
Hindi Tansl: himAlaya viSva kI sabase UzcI parvawa SreNI hE Ora eka awyaXika asama avaroXoM meM se eka hE.
